Package net.jdazher.domain.tasks.service

Interface TaskService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DomainTaskService
public interface TaskService
An interface representing a service for managing tasks in the system.

This interface defines the operations related to task management, such as retrieving, saving, updating, and searching for tasks. It serves as a contract for implementing classes that handle business logic associated with tasks.

  • Method Details

    • getTaskById

      Optional<Task> getTaskById(String id)
      Retrieves a Task by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the task to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the task if found, or Optional.empty() if not found.

    • findTasksByTitleContaining

      List<Task> findTasksByTitleContaining(String title)
      Finds tasks whose title contains the given string.
      Parameters:
      title - A string to search for within task titles.
      Returns:
      A list of tasks that contain the provided string in their title.

    • getAllTasks

      List<Task> getAllTasks()
      Retrieves all tasks in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Task entities.

    • saveTask

      Optional<Task> saveTask(Task task)
      Saves a new Task to the data store.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to save.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the saved task, or Optional.empty() if the save operation fails.

    • updateTask

      Optional<Task> updateTask(Task task)
      Updates an existing Task in the data store.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to update.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the updated task, or Optional.empty() if the update fails.

    • saveAll

      List<Task> saveAll(List<Task> tasks)
      Saves a list of tasks to the data store.
      Parameters:
      tasks - A list of tasks to save.
      Returns:
      A list of the saved Task entities.
